title: New Travel Location Required renewed email verification at every new location
content:
My thunderbird always requires a password when accessing from a new travel location. To solve this, I need to enter outlook from the web, then verify with a second email, then reenter the password in Thunderbird.

Can Thunderbird/Outlook not remember my Notebook device?

title: Sent files getting corrupted with TBird 102.7.0
content: When i send an attachment the other party a lot of the time cannot open the file. When i send the 6.5MB file to myself in the in box it shows as 331kb. TBird is set as IMAP and the laptop is running Windows 11.

title: Two very imporant hunderbird subfolders have disappeared.
content: I have archived emails in Thunderbird in subfolders for over 20 years. When I opend the programme this morning, two of those folders - very important ones - had disappeared. I have not deleted them. I have tried the search box but none of the files in those missing folders come up. The rest of the folders still appear to be there. Can anyone help please? Carol of dawes

title: Account Yahoo mail
content: Nonostante i parametri IMAP corretti (incluso OAuth2), risulta impossibile accedere ai messaggi Yahoo mail del mio account. Ho letto tutte le istruzioni, settato i parametri (in modo automatico e manuale), ma il server risponde sempre con errore di autenticazione. Ovviamente la stessa password funziona per accedere via web e non via Thunderbird. Come fare?

creator: Orealius

title: S/MIME certifiates not accepted as personal
content:
Hello All,

I generated a new S/MIME certifacte (from Sectigo) and downloaded correctly all needed files too. To test it with another program, I correctly imported it in Firefox (108.0). Problem began when I import it to Thunderbird (102.7.0). I can not manage, where it will be stored and the certificate appears in the 'People' tab instead of 'Your certificates'. Deleting the certificate, restart the program, download the newest version - did not help. When I click to a 'View' button, than the certificate is listed with all parameters - please see pictures in attachment. I did not get any error message during importing: just added a pssword and it was all. As this certificate is not listed as mine, I can not choose it to use for a signing. Did you encountered a situation like this ? Can you advise me, how to correct it ? In the past I generated certificates and never was in a situation like this. Thanks for your help. Bye George
creator: duducz

title: Thunderbird - creating a mailing list
content:
Help instructions do not correspond to the options in the program: 

  "Open the Address Book.    Select File > New > Mailing List."

The only way to open the Address Book is from the Tools menu; it shows: 

  "All Address Books    Personal Address Book    Contacts    Collected Addresses"

Whichever of these is highlighted, the New menu offers no Mailing List option. (I seem to be using Version 102 / Linux)

title: Add-On  "Expression Search" by Opto ::   Trouble Moving a Tab to a New Window when this Add-On is active.
content:
There appears to be a "Bug" / Glitch or Compatibility issues with the Add-On "Expression Search" {by Opto} and the latest version of ThunderBird.

When this Add-On is not Active, if you Right-Click on any of the Open Tabs on the Top Row, while using Thunderbird and then use MOVE TO NEW WINDOW (that is, Move a Tab to a New Window), it works fine. But once this Add-On is Active, the Move to New Window starts malfunctioning.

When the Add-On is Active, if you try to Move {one of the Tabs on the Top Row} To New Window, the New Window does pop up, and the Screen Appears as the one shown in the attachment.. but the Contents of the Tab {or the correspondng email} does not Appear.

Can someone pls solve ?

Expression Search is an extremely useful and powerful Add-On and would like to continue using this. However, the above bug / glitch or incompatibility is preventing me from using this ADD-ON.
creator: aksnehan

title: Can't download email or acess my INBOX

I'm stuck. Tried closing TBird and rebooting my windows 11 PC many times. The other email account works fine. Please help, anyone? THANKS!

title: can't complete install of newest Thunderbird
content:
I got a new laptop. I'm working through the drudgery of reinstalling everything.

to cut to the chase I downloaded the latest Thunderbird. I'm on the screen where I setup it's various features. I only use the email portion. I fill all that in manually. but I'm not seeing anything to tell it to save what I've entered. So I close out. It must be automatic.

But it's not. I reopen T Bird and I'm back to square 1. I've been on this for 2 hours and to be honest, I'm intensely frustrated.

I'm going to remove it even though I've used T Bird for many years.
creator: SumoBot

title: inbox emails being shifted from desktop to laptop, how to stop and return all inbox emails back to desktop
content:

Thank you for any help.

Fred

title: disappearance of e-mails
content:
Good morning!

I purchased a new computer and installed, with some difficulties, Thunderbird, that however seemed to work properly. But after some days, when opening "inbox", all e-mails appeared for a second, then disappeared. Looking for them in "waste basket", the same happened and "inbox" and "waste basket" remained empty.

This happened a couple of times, so I started moving immediately the incoming e-mails to "archives".

For some days all seemed to work properly, but this morning (23 jan 2023) the same disappearances occurred again AND "archives" had totally disappeared too!

Please, help me! Thanks in advance and regards.
creator: SumoBot
